resources.string: This is the first attraction. It is an exhibit that is very interesting.
This is the second attraction. It is an exhibit that is very interesting.
This is the third attraction. Talking about it a lot is something that may or may not be difficult using the android String variable.
If you are lost or don\'t know where to go, press here to bring up a map.
